channel.title: CVE Feed for XnView -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for XnView -- all products

item.title: CVE-2013-3246|2024-08-06T16:00:10.106Z -- xnview -- xnview
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in xnview.exe in XnView before 2.03 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted image layer in an XCF file.

item.title: CVE-2013-3247|2024-08-06T16:00:10.099Z -- xnview -- xnview
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in xnview.exe in XnView before 2.03 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted RLE compressed layer in an XCF file.
